cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)

#Automatically generated from files in this directory.
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/address.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/address_v4.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/address_v4_iterator.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/address_v4_range.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/address_v6.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/address_v6_iterator.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/address_v6_range.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/bad_address_cast.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/basic_endpoint.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/basic_resolver.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/basic_resolver_entry.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/basic_resolver_iterator.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/basic_resolver_query.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/basic_resolver_results.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/host_name.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/icmp.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/multicast.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/network_v4.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/network_v6.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/resolver_base.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/resolver_query_base.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/tcp.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/udp.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/unicast.hpp")
target_sources(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/v6_only.hpp")

#Automatically generated from subdirectories in this directory.
add_subdirectory("detail")
add_subdirectory("impl")
